holidays.title: Hoshana Rabbah
holidays.description: The Jewish holiday's roots are in celebration of thanksgiving for a bountiful harvest.

holidays.title: International Caps Lock Day
holidays.description: Push the Caps Lock key down and give somebody a shout out.

holidays.title: International Stuttering Awareness Day
holidays.description: International Stuttering Awareness Day shines a spotlight on stutterers and educates others about the causes.

holidays.title: National Color Day
holidays.description: Step out of the black and white box and celebrate National Color Day.

holidays.title: National Kristopher NaJee Roebuck Day
holidays.description: Let us explore how we can keep the name of Kris Roebuck alive.

holidays.title: National Make a Dog’s Day
holidays.description: What makes dogs the best pets in the world? Let us find out.

holidays.title: Scar Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Let us find out how we can heal a scar and move on with life.

holidays.title: Smart is Cool Day
holidays.description: This day recognizes, appreciates, and celebrates being smart.

holidays.title: 21 Savage’s Birthday
holidays.description: 21 Savage is a British-born rapper — and he is a living legend in the making.

holidays.title: Acacia Kersey’s Birthday
holidays.description: This well-known influencer has a strong presence on all social media platforms, particularly Instagram.

holidays.title: Aziz Generosity’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rising TikTok star, YouTuber, and social media influencer is on the road to success!

holidays.title: Baby CEO’s Birthday
holidays.description: With his incredible talent, this rapper captivated the public's attention at a young age.

holidays.title: Carrie Hope Fletcher’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rising actress, YouTuber, and writer is showing the world her many talents.

holidays.title: Charlie Wright’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young entertainer, Charlie Wright, comes from a family of creative entrepreneurs.

holidays.title: Christopher Lloyd’s Birthday
holidays.description: From Connecticut to the glam and glitz of California, Lloyd has come a long way!

holidays.title: Curly Howard’s Birthday
holidays.description: Curly Howard lived an impactful and large life — albeit not a long one.

holidays.title: Deepak Chopra’s Birthday
holidays.description: For his work, this author became one of the biggest figures in the New Age movement.

holidays.title: Deontay Wilder’s Birthday
holidays.description: Because of his numerous victories, this boxer established himself among the greatest in the boxing world.

holidays.title: Elias Harger’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here is the child actor who is already making waves in Hollywood!

holidays.title: Ethan Munck’s Birthday
holidays.description: Ethan Munck is a gifted child actor who is making it big in the entertainment industry.

holidays.title: Franz Liszt’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here is a closer look at Franz Liszt — the first classical superstar!

holidays.title: Gloria Carter Spann’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famous personality was well-known for her activism and for being the sister of Jimmy Carter.

holidays.title: Haley Sharpe’s Birthday
holidays.description: From A.L. to L.A., Haley Sharpe has come a long way, and here's how!

holidays.title: Hassan Jameel’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here is the mystery man who made it to the headlines across the world.

holidays.title: Jeff Goldblum’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today we celebrate an entertainment icon who has featured in some legendary movies.

holidays.title: Jordyn Raya James’s Birthday
holidays.description: Jordyn Raya James is the fresh-faced Ami from "Family Reunion," and we love her sass!

holidays.title: Mariah Huq’s Birthday
holidays.description: A woman of many talents, she is a reality star, actor, producer, and entrepreneur.

holidays.title: Pakalu Papito’s Birthday
holidays.description: Pakalu Papito’s actual image remains a mystery! Is he real or fake? Only time will tell.

holidays.title: Roddy Ricch’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is a lot to learn about this extraordinary Grammy-award-winning American rapper!

holidays.title: Shaggy’s Birthday
holidays.description: The modern-day king of reggae has continued to flourish from his early days of fame.

holidays.title: Sora Simmons’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sora Simmons is a fantastic Tiktok star and he's only getting started in his career!

holidays.title: SSSniperWolf’s Birthday
holidays.description: SSSniperwolf, a multi-talented gamer and D.I.Y. specialist, is truly a force to reckon with.

holidays.title: TobyMac’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-award-winning rapper is a trendsetter, and he shows no sign of slowing down.

holidays.title: Zac Hanson’s Birthday
holidays.description: The 90s gave us many gems, but none shines quite as brightly as this legend.

holidays.title: Zhuri Nova James’s Birthday
holidays.description: Zhuri Nova James is almost as popular as her parents — she is young and amazing!
